126663.「いいよ！ ご褒美の一覧を見せよう。: All right! Look at the list of rewards...

126664.「やあやあ <pc><if_woman>ちゃん<else>くん<endif>！:
Hey there, <pc>! What can I do for
you today? Or did you need to ask me
something?
<break>

126666.「何について 聞きたいのかな？\n<break>: What do you want to ask me about?<break>

126667.「<pc><if_woman>ちゃん<else>くん<endif>には\n 特定:
suffix for familiar personnative Japanese reading (rendering) of a Chinese characterI've cast a spell to make the names of certain inhabitants of Astoria appear yellow! Using this power, I want you to find the
inhabitants of Astoltia that I've chosen and talk to them. And when I confirm that you've spoken to them, I'll reward you with a reward
on the spot. I'll also update the Yellow Diaries. If you're not sure where you're going, come to me or check the Yellow
Diaries.

126668.「君に 渡したイエローダイアリーは \n 私のものと おそろいだぞ！\n<br>:
The yellow diary I gave you is the same as mine! What's more, the two diaries have a magic feature that links them together! If
you write about an inhabitant of Astoltia in the one I have... suffix for familiar personnative Japanese reading (rendering) of a Chinese characterI'll write down the names of the residents I chose. I'm going to write down the names of the residents I've chosen, so you can look
them up, starting with the most important ones... If I find a new resident that I like, I'll add it to the list, so keep an eye out
for that!

126669.「私が選んだ 住人を 見つけだして \n 話すことができたら お礼として ひとり:
If you can find and talk to the inhabitants I've chosen, I'll give you a small medal for each one... I'll even give you a reward based
on the number of people you talk to! You can find your rewards in the Yellow Diary... I'll start with the most important items.

126670.「他に 聞きたいことはあるかな？\n<break>:
Is there anything else you want to ask me
about?<break>

126672.「また 面白い住人を見つけたら\n イエローダイアリーに追記していくから\n お:
If I find any other interesting residents,
I'll add them to the Diary, so please lend
me a hand if you can!
<end>

126673.「それじゃあ 引き続き がんばってくれ！\n 応援しているぞ！ ふふっ。\n<e:
Anyways, keep up the good work!
I'll be rooting for you!
<end>
